EmailTemplate.subject: 2 Days Only To Get 2x Bonus Points
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> FREE Shipping* <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/ EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z00nlh?cmp=EBGRDEC18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> 48 HRS Only <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z00nlh?cmp=EBGRDEC18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> To Double Up And Save
Your time is running out! Points in our Bonus Points Centre have been doubled for a limited time.
1 POINT = $1
Take advantage on or before December 12th, 2018 at 24:00 EDT. Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z00nlh?cmp=EBGRPOINTSDEC18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Items we've handpicked for you: <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/product/OM96850_Grand__Toy_Black_Mesh_Magazine_File.aspx?cmp=EBGRDEC18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> 4 Points 2 Points
Grand & Toy Black Mesh Magazine File <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/product/T-SG-3SWVOT_ergoCentric_tCentric_Hybrid_Mesh_Back_Executive_Synchro_Glide_Chair.aspx?cmp=EBGRDEC18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> 94 Points 47 Points
ergoCentric tCentric Hybrid Mesh Back Executive Synchro Glide Chair <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/product/IM77193Y_Logitech_Marathon_M705_-_mouse_-_2_4_GHz_-_charcoal.aspx?cmp=EBGRNOV18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> 8 Points 4 Points
Logitech Marathon M705 - mouse - 2.4 GHz - charcoal <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/product/1011128_Mother_Parkers_Coffee.aspx?cmp=EBGRDEC18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> 2 Points 1 Points
Mother Parkers Coffee Don’t forget to visit our Bonus Points Centre every month to get the most out of your rewards! Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Please allow up to 30 days for any bonus points to be added to your account. To check your current Grand Rewards points balance, please sign in to your account.
